title: Where can I get a portable DVD player? - Quora

response.answer_text: A quick google shows lots available at both Amazon and Walmart, and I’m sure there are similar retailers worldwide, the point being that there are still many models being made. Pay attention to the quality of the screen, and your options for adding an external monitor. Weight and screen size and speakers and battery life are important, as well - price and availability of replacement batteries is worth checking, too.
